H0.text: Earning money is a good way to recycle because recycling is important to the environment.

H1.text: Producing more carbon dioxide for plants is why recycling is important to the environment.

H2.text: Decreases the amount of natural resources is why recycling is important to the environment.

H3.text: Recycling is a way of conserving nonrenewable resources, which is why it is important to the environment.

A4.text: Recycling is an alternative to 'conventional' waste disposal that can save material and help lower greenhouse gas emissions.

A5.text: Critics argue that the costs and energy used in collection and transportation detract from (and outweigh) the costs and energy saved in the production process.
